catalognumber.name: Catalog Number
catalognumber.desc: Can be configured to be numeric or in any format

collectionobjecttype.name: Object Type
collectionobjecttype.desc: Type of collection object (Rock, Mineral, Meteorite, Fossil, etc.).

catalogeddate.name: Cataloged Date
catalogeddate.desc: Date the object was entered into the catalog.

cataloger.name: Cataloger
cataloger.desc: Agent record for the user cataloging the collection object.

accession.name: Accession Number
accession.desc: Accession contains the usual fields within Specify.

text1.name: Quality
text1.desc: Indicates the quality of the specimen (from 0 stars to 5 stars).

text2.name: Hazard Type
text2.desc: Subdivision of hazards based on a set of unique characteristics and negative health outcomes.

text3.name: Hazard Remarks
text3.desc: General remarks regarding the hazard type within the scope of the specific collection object.

remarks.name: Remarks
remarks.desc: Miscellaneous remarks about the collection object.

collectionobjectattachments.name: Collection Object Attachments
collectionobjectattachments.desc: Enable attaching any file to this record.

collectionobjectcitations.name: Collection Object Citations
collectionobjectcitations.desc: Enables users to capture data about the reference work where this information is cited.

conservdescriptions.name: Conservation Description
conservdescriptions.desc: Captures information about how to display, handle, or conserve the specimen.

paleocontext.name: Geologic Context
paleocontext.desc: Geologic context about the specimen, including information on the chronostratigraphy, lithostratigraphy, and tectonic setting.

relativeages.name: Relative Ages
relativeages.desc: One or more relative ages associated with the specimen.

absoluteages.name: Absolute Ages
absoluteages.desc: One or more absolute ages associated with the specimen.

text1.name: Handling Requirements
text1.desc: A summary of the procedural requirements employed to preserve and protect the specimen during physical interaction.

backgroundinfo.name: Background Info
backgroundinfo.desc: Any background information on the object or preparation.

lightrecommendations.name: Light Recommendations
lightrecommendations.desc: Information about the recommended lighting conditions for the object or preparation.

displayrecommendations.name: Display Recommendations
displayrecommendations.desc: Information about the recommended display technique for the object or preparation.

otherrecommendations.name: Other Recommendations
otherrecommendations.desc: Miscellaneous recommendations for the object or preparation.

events.name: Conservator Events
events.desc: Links to one or more Conservator Events.

treatmentreport.name: Treatment
treatmentreport.desc: A description of the treatment that was done.

treatedbyagent.name: Treated By
treatedbyagent.desc: Captures the person who treated the object or preparation.

examdate.name: Exam Date
examdate.desc: The date the object was examined.

examinedbyagent.name: Examined By
examinedbyagent.desc: Captures the person who examined the object or preparation.

conditionreport.name: Condition Report
conditionreport.desc: A report on the condition of the object or preparation at the moment of the conservator event.

curatorapprovaldate.name: Approval Date
curatorapprovaldate.desc: Approval date for the conservation event.

curator.name: Approver
curator.desc: Captures the curator who authorized the treatment.

conserveventattachments.name: Conservator Event Attachments
conserveventattachments.desc: Enable attaching any file to this record.

name.name: Name
name.desc: The name of the type of object (Mineral, Fossil, Meteorite, Rock, etc.).

taxontreedef.name: Taxon Tree
taxontreedef.desc: The Taxon tree that the type corresponds to.

collection.name: Collection
collection.desc: Collection Object Types are specific to each Specify collection.

name.name: Name
name.desc: The name or ID of the Collection Object Group.

cogtype.name: Collection Object Group Type
cogtype.desc: Dictates the business logic and display of the Collection Object Group.

collection.name: Collection
collection.desc: Collection Object Groups are only visible within a single Specify collection.

isprimary.name: Is Primary
isprimary.desc: Indicates whether a particular collection object within a group is the primary member.

issubstrate.name: Is Substrate
issubstrate.desc: Indicates whether a particular collection object within a group is the substrate that represents the group.

precedence.name: Precedence
precedence.desc: Determines the order of group members when displayed.

text1.name: Proportion
text1.desc: Qualitative or quantitative fraction of a whole for part/whole relationships.

text2.name: Role
text2.desc: Role this object plays in the Collection Object Group.

childco.name: Child Collection Object
childco.desc: Represents a collection object member of a group.

childcog.name: Child Collection Object Group
childcog.desc: Represents a collection object group member of a group.

number3.name: Insured Value
number3.desc: Value the collection object is insured for.

number2.name: Purchase Price
number2.desc: Price paid for the collection object.

number1.name: Appraised Value
number1.desc: Financial value of the collection object.

text1.name: Valuation Remarks
text1.desc: Notes on the valuation and any material changes which affect value.

agent1.name: Valuator
agent1.desc: Person who evaluated the value of an object.

text2.name: Analyses
text2.desc: Miscellaneous analyses performed to the object.

text3.name: Size
text3.desc: Size of the specimen as originally described.

text4.name: Mass
text4.desc: Current mass as reported in primary source material, includes units.

text6.name: Luminescence Description
text6.desc: Description of light emitted from the mineral when energized.

text7.name: Analysis Type
text7.desc: Technique utilized to determine the chemical composition of a mineral.

text8.name: Measured Formula
text8.desc: Calculated chemical formula using analytical data.

text9.name: Chemistry Remarks
text9.desc: Remarks on the chemistry of the object.

text13.name: Twinning Law
text13.desc: Description of any physically discernable twinning.

text14.name: Exsolution Texture
text14.desc: Textures of any mineral aggregate or intergrowth formed by exsolution.

text15.name: Cleavage
text15.desc: Property of breaking along specific planes, especially those parallel to crystal faces.

text16.name: Luster
text16.desc: Reflection of light from the surface of a mineral.

yesNo1.name: Widmanstätten Pattern
yesNo1.desc: Indicates whether the specimen exhibits the Widmanstätten pattern.

text19.name: Composition
text19.desc: Bulk chemical or mineralogical composition of the meteorite.

text20.name: Shape
text20.desc: Overall shape or morphology of the meteorite (e.g., angular, rounded, regmaglypts).

yesNo2.name: Magnetism
yesNo2.desc: Indicates whether the meteorite is magnetic.

text21.name: Impact Features
text21.desc: Description of any impact-related features (e.g., fusion crust, shatter cones, shock veins).

preparedbyagent.name: Prepared By
preparedbyagent.desc: Person responsible for creating a preparation.

description.name: Description
description.desc: Miscellaneous remarks or a description of the preparation.

storage.name: Storage
storage.desc: Current storage location for a preparation.

preparationattachments.name: Preparation Attachments
preparationattachments.desc: Enable attaching any file to this record.

stationfieldnumber.name: Station Field Number
stationfieldnumber.desc: Used as the primary identifier for collecting event records.

text1.name: Geologic Event
text1.desc: Name of an identifiable event associated with the formation of a geologic specimen.

startdate.name: Start Date
startdate.desc: Start date of the collecting event.

enddate.name: End Date
enddate.desc: End date of the collecting event.

starttime.name: Start Time
starttime.desc: Start time of the collecting event.

endtime.name: End Time
endtime.desc: End time of the collecting event.

verbatimdate.name: Verbatim Date
verbatimdate.desc: Verbatim date as recorded by the collector.

locality.name: Locality
locality.desc: Locality associated with the collecting event.

collectingtrip.name: Collecting Trip
collectingtrip.desc: Collecting trip associated with the collecting event.

preferredtaxon.name: Preferred Taxon
preferredtaxon.desc: Preferred taxon when the selected taxon is a synonym.

text1.name: Confirmation Technique
text1.desc: Analytical technique utilized to confirm the identification.

alternatename.name: Verbatim Name
alternatename.desc: Verbatim name when the standard hierarchy is not used.

determiners.name: Determiners
determiners.desc: One or more determiners involved in identifying the collection object.

determinationcitations.name: Determination Citations
determinationcitations.desc: Reference works where the determination is cited.

fullname.name: Full Name
fullname.desc: Constructed by Specify systematically, not editable by the user.

text1.name: Identifier
text1.desc: Reference to the name within the current context (e.g., Dana or Nickel-Strunz Number).

text2.name: Identifier Type
text2.desc: Type of resource associated with the identifier or schema it conforms to.

parent.name: Parent
parent.desc: Parent node in a higher rank.

taxonattachments.name: Attachments
taxonattachments.desc: Attachments linked to the taxon record.

agename.name: Age Name
agename.desc: Name from the Geologic Time Scale tree.

text1.name: Uncertainty Type
text1.desc: Calculation used to determine the error of a numerical age.

text2.name: Verbatim Age
text2.desc: Verbatim name for the relative age.

datingmethodremarks.name: Dating Method Remarks
datingmethodremarks.desc: Remarks related to the dating method used.

relativeageattachments.name: Relative Age Attachments
relativeageattachments.desc: Enable attaching any file to this record.

relativeagecitations.name: Relative Age Citations
relativeagecitations.desc: Reference works where the relative age is cited.

text1.name: Uncertainty Type
text1.desc: Calculation used to determine the error of a numerical age.

text2.name: Verbatim Age
text2.desc: Verbatim age, used when units are not MYA.

datingmethodremarks.name: Dating Method Remarks
datingmethodremarks.desc: Remarks related to the dating method used.

absoluteageattachments.name: Absolute Age Attachments
absoluteageattachments.desc: Enable attaching any file to this record.

absoluteagecitations.name: Absolute Age Citations
absoluteagecitations.desc: Reference works where the absolute age is cited.

fullname.name: Full Name
fullname.desc: Constructed by Specify systematically, not editable by the user.

isaccepted.name: Is Accepted
isaccepted.desc: If true, this is the accepted name. If false, it is a synonym.

text1.name: Tectonic Setting
text1.desc: Description of the tectonic setting associated with the specimen.

paleocontext.name: Geologic Context
paleocontext.desc: Geologic context about the specimen, including information on the chronostratigraphy, lithostratigraphy, and tectonic setting.

name.name: Name
name.desc: Name of the Geologic Time Scale item.

fullname.name: Full Name
fullname.desc: Constructed by Specify systematically, not editable by the user.

isaccepted.name: Is Accepted
isaccepted.desc: If true, this is the accepted name. If false, it is a synonym.

definitionitem.name: Rank
definitionitem.desc: Rank within the Geologic Time Scale.
